tripTitle: A Culinary and Heritage Journey through Hyderabad

activities.name: Explore Charminar & Laad Bazaar
activities.description: Begin your journey at the iconic Charminar. Climb to the top for a panoramic view of the bustling streets and then wander through the famous Laad Bazaar, known for its bangles and pearls.

activities.name: Lunch at Shadab Hotel
activities.description: Experience authentic Hyderabadi cuisine. Famous for its Biryani and Nihari, this is a must-visit spot near Charminar for a taste of the old city.

activities.name: Chowmahalla Palace
activities.description: Step back in time at the magnificent palace of the Nizams. Admire the grand architecture, vintage car collection, and opulent courtyards.

activities.name: Ramoji Film City Tour (Half-Day)
activities.description: Explore the world's largest integrated film city. Enjoy the thematic gardens, film sets, and various entertainment shows. A fun-filled morning for everyone.

activities.name: Lunch in Jubilee Hills
activities.description: Dine at one of the trendy cafes in Jubilee Hills, the modern hub of Hyderabad, offering a variety of cuisines.

activities.name: Boating & Sunset at Hussain Sagar Lake
activities.description: Enjoy a relaxing evening with a boat ride to the giant Buddha statue in the middle of Hussain Sagar Lake. The sunset views are spectacular.
